q: Mike Pence , who has decided against running. And Mike Huckabee , who is doing well as a Fox News contributor. And Sarah Palin , another Fox luminary, would have the most to lose financially from running. Rick Santorum thinks the left is trying to goad her into it, hoping she would be weak among the independent voters who decide most elections. For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions,'' Eric Schmidt wrote in a post on href="http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2011/01/update-from-chairman.html"> Google's Blog, referring to himself, Larry Page , and Sergey Brin . This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. As a result, Larry Page will lead product development and technology strategy within Google and take over Eric Schmidt 's day-to-day role as CEO starting April 4. As Executive Chairman, Eric Schmidt will focus on deals, partnerships,

software. 2011, 22:16 EST Google announced Thursday that co-founder Larry Page would replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the Internet giant in April. Google said Eric Schmidt would remain with the company as executive chairman and focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. The firm's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will work on strategic projects and new products, Google said in a statement. Quotes delayed, except where indicated otherwise. Delay times are 15 mins

staff Chicago White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle is raising eyebrows over his recent comments about Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who has bounced back after being jailed for his role in a dogfighting ring in 2007. He had a great year and a great comeback, but there were times where we watched the game, and I know it's bad to say, but there were times where we hope he gets hurt, Mark Buehrle , an animal-rights activist, told MLB.com Wednesday for a story focusing on the work he and his wife do with animals.
